Author: ddmar
Text: I feel this so hard. I'm a 5' 3'' Asian, with a BMI in the 20's. My sister's frame is so small, and she's absolutely gorgeous, same with my boyfriend's sister. I'm over here with a pear shaped body, huge quads, and even when I lose weight, I just look disproportionate because of how huge my legs are ugh. I swear, Asian beauty standards are the worst
